title: Ending the Curse
description: A suspenseful mystery unfolds before you as you turn the pages of this tale. “Friends till the end,” they always told each other. They just didn’t think the end would be so soon for Connie. United they stand as they endeavor to aid their friend in breaking a curse. A surprise gift from those already departed of this world and the reuniting of a family as this story twists toward the climax.  What lies hidden beneath the alcoves apart from the expected riches? Read on to find out.
author: Julie-Anne Gamble
